summary: A werewolf model/texture compilation of \"Werewolf reskin\" by MikoYork, Female Werewolf by Moutarde421, Derrax\' Male Werewolves and some more... R17+!
descriptionHtml:
[b]- Adult Real Werewolves -[/b]
A werewolf model/texture compilation of \"Werewolf reskin\" by MikoYork, Female Werewolf by Moutarde421, Derrax\' Male Werewolves and some more...
[i]Please note: this mod contains materials unsuited for work or children![/i]

[b]What it does:[/b]
This mod replaces original all-purpose werewolf model with distinctive male and female models, additional textures, some more er... unspeakables.
Made by requests.

[b]Requirements:[/b]
Skyrim, ~64MB disk space

[b]Compatibility:[/b]
the ESP file only contains links to character meshes. If your favorite werewolf-related mod already does the same thing, you may probably discard it (advanced users only!)

[b]Known issues:[/b]
Models were additionally updated and fixed. The only remaining problem is smoothing groups order.

[b]Installation:[/b]
1. Unpack files into your Skyrim/Data/ directory
2. Activate provided .ESP file in Skyrim launcher
3. Load any game you want

This is a complete package which contains:
An updated and enhanced version of
\"Werewolf reskin\" by MikoYork
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1205
for
Female Werewolf by Moutarde421
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10989
and
Derrax\' Male Werewolves
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4445
including
erected model by anonymous.

Included ESPs differ only in the way they were created:
Werewolve.esp - made with CreationKit
Werewolve.esp.SkyEdit.bak - made with SkyEdit
just in case of... mysterious problems.

Provided textures require these new special models (but original male model will work in any case) and ESP file.
Textures and compilation together by ~X~
2012
